did.abstract: This collection consists of the scrapbook of Charles Staton, a reporter on the "Brooklyn Standard Union" (1800-1910). The scrapbook contains newpspaer clippings as well as listings of various events to be covered by named reporters. There are several references to the Spanish American War of 1898.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Charles Staton was a reporter on the "Brooklyn Standard Union."
